thread.section_title: MOO.COM Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MOO.COM | www.moo.com | 3 of 147
thread.title: CT

author: CT
title: CT
text: Moo's website is highly functional, and balanced with creative, imaginative imagery. While looking for the right platform to create your card, you have the opportunity to encounter multiple ways to express your business and even the chance to include a different image on every card. Every part of my experience was enjoyable right up to receiving my cards in the mail. The paper is very high quality, ecologically sound and impressive in it's weight and strength. The graphics were exactly as advertised. I could not be happier, I love my Moo cards!
